byline.original: By KATHERINE SCHULTEN and MICHAEL GONCHAR

abstract: At least two Fridays a month this school year, we’ll be posting films we think will inspire powerful conversations — and then inviting teenagers and teachers from around the world to have those conversations here, on the blog.

headline.main: Introducing Film Club: A New Teaching and Discussion Forum About Short Times Documentaries

snippet: At least two Fridays a month this school year, we’ll be posting films we think will inspire powerful conversations — and then inviting teenagers and teachers from around the world to have those conversations here, on the blog.
